description.value:
The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered. You ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water.

In addition, if you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Balance]{Balance} on a slippery or wet surface, or on an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Swim]{Swim}, you get a critical success instead.
